filmography.title: The Blue Angel
filmography.role_description: A seductive cabaret singer who unwittingly destroys the life and dignity of a respectable school professor who falls for her.
filmography.plot: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

filmography.title: Morocco
filmography.role_description: A cabaret singer in North Africa who performs in a tuxedo and must choose between a wealthy artist and a rough legionnaire.
filmography.plot: A cabaret singer and a legionnaire fall in love, but their relationship is complicated by her wealthy suitor and his dangerous lifestyle.

filmography.title: Dishonored
filmography.role_description: A widow turned prostitute who becomes a spy for the Austrian government during World War I, facing a tragic fate for love.
filmography.plot: A woman spies for Austria during World War I but commits treason by letting a Russian spy escape.

filmography.title: Shanghai Express
filmography.role_description: A notorious 'coaster' (courtesan) traveling through revolution-torn China who reunites with a former lover on a dangerous train journey.
filmography.plot: Multiple passengers on a train from Beijing to Shanghai contend with one another and the possibility that the train will be attacked by rebels.

filmography.title: Blonde Venus
filmography.role_description: A former nightclub singer who returns to the stage (famously performing in a gorilla suit) to pay for her husband's medical treatment.
filmography.plot: A woman becomes a cabaret singer and a rich man's mistress to pay for her husband's life-saving surgery.

filmography.title: The Song of Songs
filmography.role_description: A naive German peasant girl who moves to Berlin and is exploited by the men she meets, modeling for a sculptor.
filmography.plot: A country girl moves to Berlin and falls for a sculptor, but is tricked into marrying a wealthy baron.

filmography.title: The Scarlet Empress
filmography.role_description: The innocent German princess who hardens her heart and uses her sexuality to seize the Russian throne as Catherine the Great.
filmography.plot: A German princess is selected to marry the simple-minded Grand Duke Peter of Russia, but she has her own ambitions.

filmography.title: The Devil Is a Woman
filmography.role_description: A heartless Spanish cigarette girl who torments and manipulates older men in 19th-century Seville.
filmography.plot: In flashbacks, an older man recounts his obsession with a manipulative woman to a younger man, who then falls for her himself.

filmography.title: Desire
filmography.role_description: A glamorous jewel thief who steals a pearl necklace in Paris and tries to smuggle it into Spain using an unsuspecting American tourist.
filmography.plot: A jewel thief falls in love with an automotive engineer while trying to smuggle a stolen necklace across the border.

filmography.title: The Garden of Allah
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman seeking spiritual peace in the desert who marries a man harboring a dark secret about his past as a monk.
filmography.plot: A Trappist monk flees his monastery and falls in love with a beautiful woman in the Sahara desert.

filmography.title: Knight Without Armour
filmography.role_description: A Russian countess who is protected by a British spy posing as a Bolshevik during the chaos of the Russian Revolution.
filmography.plot: A British spy helps a Russian Countess escape the Bolsheviks during the Russian Revolution.

filmography.title: Angel
filmography.role_description: The neglected wife of a diplomat who has a brief fling in Paris with a stranger, only to meet him again in London.
filmography.plot: A diplomat's wife has a brief affair with a stranger in Paris, but complications arise when he turns out to be her husband's wartime friend.

filmography.title: Destry Rides Again
filmography.role_description: A rough-and-tumble saloon singer who helps a mild-mannered deputy sheriff clean up a lawless town, reviving Dietrich's career.
filmography.plot: A soft-spoken deputy sheriff who doesn't like guns is hired to tame a wild Western town, where he meets a boisterous saloon singer.

filmography.title: Seven Sinners
filmography.role_description: A cabaret singer in the South Seas who has a habit of getting deported for causing brawls, falling for a handsome Navy officer.
filmography.plot: A cafe singer causes a riot at every port she visits, but tries to change her ways when she falls for a Navy lieutenant.

filmography.title: The Flame of New Orleans
filmography.role_description: An adventurer in 1840s New Orleans who poses as a countess to snag a wealthy banker but falls for a riverboat captain.
filmography.plot: A European adventuress poses as a countess in New Orleans to marry a wealthy banker, but a sea captain threatens her plans.

filmography.title: Manpower
filmography.role_description: A hostess at a clip joint who marries a good-hearted power linesman but falls in love with his best friend.
filmography.plot: Two power linesmen and best friends fall out over a woman with a troubled past.

filmography.title: The Spoilers
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner in Nome, Alaska, during the Gold Rush who is caught between her lover and a corrupt Gold Commissioner.
filmography.plot: Gold miners in Alaska must protect their claim from a corrupt commissioner who is trying to steal it.

filmography.title: Kismet
filmography.role_description: The 'Queen of the Bagdad Dancers' and mistress to the Grand Vizier, who becomes involved with a beggar-magician.
filmography.plot: A beggar-magician becomes king for a day and tries to marry his daughter to a prince while wooing the queen of dancers.

filmography.title: Golden Earrings
filmography.role_description: A Romani woman who helps a British intelligence officer escape the Nazis by disguising him as a gypsy.
filmography.plot: A British colonel escapes the Nazis with the help of a gypsy woman who disguises him and takes him across country.

filmography.title: A Foreign Affair
filmography.role_description: A German nightclub singer and former mistress of a high-ranking Nazi who is investigated by a visiting American congresswoman.
filmography.plot: A congressional committee visits occupied Berlin to investigate troop morale, where a congresswoman suspects a singer is being protected by an American officer.

filmography.title: Stage Fright
filmography.role_description: A glamorous, manipulative stage actress who is suspected of murdering her husband, drawing a young drama student into a mystery.
filmography.plot: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high-society star.

filmography.title: No Highway in the Sky
filmography.role_description: A famous film actress and passenger on a trans-Atlantic flight who comforts a scientist convinced the plane will crash.
filmography.plot: An aeronautical engineer predicts a new type of plane will fail after a specific number of hours, but no one believes him until he is on board one.

filmography.title: Rancho Notorious
filmography.role_description: A former saloon hall girl who runs a hideout for outlaws called 'Chuck-a-Luck', becoming the target of a man seeking revenge.
filmography.plot: A man sets out to find his fiancée's killer and winds up at a ranch run by a former dance hall queen that serves as a hideout for criminals.

filmography.title: Witness for the Prosecution
filmography.role_description: The icy, composed German wife of a man accused of murder, who becomes the key witness for the prosecution in a twist-filled trial.
filmography.plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

filmography.title: Touch of Evil
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, fortune-telling madam in a Mexican border town who shares a melancholic past with the corrupt police captain.
filmography.plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

filmography.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
filmography.role_description: The widow of an executed German general who befriends the American judge presiding over the war crimes tribunal.
filmography.plot: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.

filmography.title: Just a Gigolo
filmography.role_description: An elderly baroness who runs a regiment of gigolos in post-WWI Berlin; Dietrich's final film appearance.
filmography.plot: A Prussian war veteran returns to Berlin after WWI and drifts into work as a gigolo in a brothel run by a baroness.
